text: The list below is of the municipalities of Greece with more than 10,000 people. The data is from the 2001 census. Explanation of the superscript numbers: 1 a suburb of the Athens Urban Area, in Athens’ agglomeration/conurbation 2 a suburb of the Thessaloniki Urban Area, in Thessaloniki’s agglomeration/conurbation 4 a suburb of Athens' Metropolitan Area 5 a suburb of Thessaloniki's Metropolitan Area 7 a municipal unit of the Heraklion Urban Area, in Heraklion's agglomeration/conurbation 6 a municipal unit of the Volos Urban Area, in Volos' agglomeration/conurbation 8 the core unit of Patras agglomeration/conurbation with population of 213,984 * The settlement (CDP) of Athens is the central district of the Athens Urban Area. * The settlement (CDP) of Thessaloniki is the central district of the Thessaloniki Urban Area.
